CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 1, 1955, pg. 19, reads: "Walt Harper Returns - Pictured above is Walt Harper's orchestra which will open at the Crawford Grill Monday, Jan. 3. This date comes on the heels of Harper's successful college proms and one-nighter tours that took the band to major colleges in East.  Harper holds the house record at the Grill and his band is being hailed as one of the newer rising good bands of the country."
TitMainTitle: Walt Harper seated at piano with his band, including Tiny Irvin and bass player Billy Lewis in front row, and Nate Harper with saxophone, drummer Harold "Brushes" Lee, Marion "Boonie" Hazel, and Jon Morris with trombone
